name: Lithic Spear
title: Evil Shall Never Prevail: Lithic Spear
desc: These spears were forged from the rocks of the Guyun Stone Forest, and were favored by the Millelith of old. Their hardness knows no equal.

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">The character deals +1 DMG.<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">When played: For each of your party members from Liyue, grant <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">1 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Shield point to the character to which this is attached. (Max 3 points)(<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Only Polearm Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)
